alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Lamoille; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 3:27PM EST until December 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, with localized totals of up to 24 inches possible across the highest elevations of the Adirondacks and Green Mountains. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and central, northwest and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. Power outages are possible due to heavy wet snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will approach 1 to 2 inches per hour at times on Friday. The snow tapers off to snow showers on Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Lamoille; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor
